comment: Smart Data Models - ExcANS adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcANS/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian excitation system. It represents static field voltage or excitation current feedback excitation system.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: blint
contents.comment: Governor Control Flag (BLINT).  0 = lead-lag regulator 1 = proportional integral regulator. Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ifmn
contents.comment: Minimum exciter current (I).  Typical Value = -5.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ifmx
contents.comment: Maximum exciter current (I).  Typical Value = 6.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: Exciter gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k3
contents.comment: AVR gain (K).  Typical Value = 1000. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kce
contents.comment: Ceiling factor (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: krvecc
contents.comment: Feedback enabling (K).  0 = Open loop control 1 = Closed loop control. Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: kvfif
contents.comment: Rate feedback signal flag (K).  0 = output voltage of the exciter 1 = exciter field current. Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Time constant (T).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1.6. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Exciter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmn
contents.comment: Maximum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = -5.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmx
contents.comment: Minimum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 6.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
